Text:
I've downloaded the torrent and tried to install the game, but when the installation of the game is finished, it automatically starts to look for the newest patch... Then the installer finds out that i do not have the original cd in the cd-rom, and wont fuc**** download the patch!!! And i can't figure out a way to skip the patchdownload....
Can someone please help?

Thanks.
change the folder name, and then click cancel.(e.x 2kgames/bioshock)

I have the same prob as JonastheMan.... And its driving me nuts.... I've waited days for this game..... I have 2 setups... _setup and setup which one should i use? both gives the same respond! I have tried renaming the folder that bioshock is being installed in but when i press "cancel" as said above i just quit the setup and it says: Setup failed, installition was not complete.... please do it again later or something like that.... could someone just tell me EXACTLY what i should do? I don't want this dl to be an waste... -_-
packa upp filen som heter Vcredist_x86 klistra in den i mapen där spelet är installerat kör den filen där  klika på bios symbolen så går spelet i gång så gjorde jag  funka
read the bioshock.nfo file first use the notepad for read right click and open with notepad it 's easy !!!!!!
